org.avaje.metric

Class MetricManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.avaje.metric.MetricManager

  • public class MetricManager
extends Object
    Manages the creation and registration of Metrics.

    Provides methods to allow agents to go through the registered metrics and gather/report the statistics.

    This uses a service locator to initialise a underlying PluginMetricManager instance. A default implementation of PluginMetricManager is provided by avaje-metric-core.

      • name

        public static MetricName name(Class<?> cls,
              String name)
        Create a MetricName based on a class and name.

        Often the name maps to a method name.

      • name

        public static MetricName name(String group,
              String type,
              String name)
        Create a Metric name based on group, type and name.
        Parameters:
        group - The group which often maps to a package name.
        type - The type which often maps to a simple class name.
        name - The name which often maps to a method name.

      • name

        public static MetricName name(String name)
        Create a Metric name by parsing a name that is expected to include periods (dot notation similar to package.Class.method).

      • getMetricNameCache

        public static MetricNameCache getMetricNameCache(Class<?> cls)
        Return a MetricNameCache for the given class.

        The MetricNameCache can be used to derive MetricName objects dynamically with relatively less overhead.

      • getTimedMetricGroup

        public static TimedMetricGroup getTimedMetricGroup(Class<?> cls)
        Return the TimedMetricGroup with a class providing the base metric name.

        The package name is the 'group' and the simple class name the 'type'.

      • getTimedMetricGroup

        public static TimedMetricGroup getTimedMetricGroup(String group,
                                   String type)
        Return a TimedMetricGroup with a common group and type name.
        Parameters:
        group - the common group name
        type - the common type name
        Returns:
        the TimedMetricGroup used to create TimedMetric's that have a common base name.
